<MemberDefinition
  prototype="void LoongArchPassConfig::addCodeGenPrepare ()"
  labels = {["virtual"]}>
Add pass to prepare the LLVM IR for code generation.

This should be done before exception handling preparation passes.

### addPreEmitPass2() {#a79336a02125b6aa1dff8505d6a307a78}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype="void LoongArchPassConfig::addPreEmitPass2 ()"
  labels = {["virtual"]}>
Targets may add passes immediately before machine code is emitted in this callback.

This is called even later than <code>addPreEmitPass</code>.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/loongarch/loongarchtargetmachine-cpp/#l00159">159</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/loongarch/loongarchtargetmachine-cpp">LoongArchTargetMachine.cpp</a>.
